title: Daily reminder that we need an option to use the season 1-4 ranked Champion select theme
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WIOh512j8XM

Since we can use the classic Summoner's Rift theme, why not allow use to use the old ranked theme?
{{sticker:sg-janna}} 
pls riot pls

replies.body:
The biggest problem I can think of with implementing the old pick/ban music is that the new Draft format doesn't have just one piece of music. It's got a modal system that slightly adjusts what you're hearing as you cycle through the draft, so you hear a different piece during champ declaration, a different piece during bans, and then a different piece during the picks. It's not as easy as just slapping the old theme into ranked and calling it a day. 

That being said, I 100% agree that Riot should bring the old theme back in one way or another. Might require more technical work, but it was a fantastic piece of music.
Ah yes, the classic theme of League of Legends. Brings back memories to my 1st year of League (season 4). I'll be down for it.
